description:
Online Sourcing Made Easy is a course that is designed to train the student to continually find items online to purchase for resell. Chris Wilkey is a master in the art of finding items to sell of Amazon and he wants to share his knowledge with you through this course.

This course will consist of some videos and walk throughs of the techniques used to find price differences across sites such as Amazon, Walmart, BestBuy, eBay, and many other sites. Once we are able to find these price differences, I will show you how to determine an item is something that would be good for resale.

After you finish this course, you should be comfortable finding products online and knowing when to pull the trigger on a purchase.
title: Online Sourcing Made Easy
